title: An Introduction to Sappho
description: An eavesdropper never hears any good of themselves, but Claire overhears something by accident that sounds like a mistake but which demands she question it, follow it up, and work out why.While being turned off by a bore at a lacklustre party being held at her residence, and with the night looking like a waste of effort, Claire stumbles backwards into a completely new world of sensation. One that she could never have imagined.Enter Samantha, one of Claire's best friends, who inadvertently has exposed something raw and sensitive. It wasn't anything Claire was supposed to have heard but, now that she has, fate takes them on a path toward something remarkable.Samantha becomes Claire's guide towards the experiences and emotions that will make the night far more special for Claire.
author: Xavier Edwards
